resources.string:
• All teams must register by 15 March 2020.

 • Registration fee:
 	 SMVITM Students: ₹200.00 per student.
 	 External Students: ₹200.00 per student.
 • Participants are requested to follow the punctuality and also should not disclose their identity or college name during the competition.

 • The participants should bring their valid college identity cards.

 • Organizers hold the right to change the rules of the event before the event begins.

 • The decision of the judges for all the competitions will be final and no further argument will be entertained.

 • The college which bags the highest and second highest points will be crowned the overall winners and runners respectively.
